mapper.update: update lg_goodsdamage set goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entryTime = #{entrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, storekeeperId = #{storekeeperid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, outgoing = #{outgoing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goodsDamageId = #{goodsdamageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select goodsDamageId, goodsId, amount, entryTime, storekeeperId, outgoing, remarks, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_goodsdamage where goodsDamageId = #{goodsdamageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select goodsDamageId, goodsId, amount, entryTime, storekeeperId, outgoing, remarks, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_goodsdamage
